name: DontStopToRun
description:
Game For Android

Test this arcade runner when your objective its get the most high score you can versus your friends! You can try to get the number one in the world ranking. The game was development for BGJ Company.

Download

Download for free in google play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.BGJCompany.DontStopToRun2

Last Updates

  • The Shop is here for all users!
  • Enabled 3 new costumes with different powers!
  • The pause menu is fixed!
  • Now you can get diamonds when you are playing!
  • Bug: infinite chest fixed
  • Bug: game over screen fixed 

Other Useful links

If you want to know when we update the game and other news visit our facebook page https://www.facebook.com/bgjcompany. Our visit our website https://kiritotheslayer201.wixsite.com/bgjcompany
